com.freedomotic.helpers

Class UdpHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.freedomotic.helpers.UdpHelper

  • public class UdpHelper
extends Object
    This class implements an UDP server listening for incoming packets and provides a method to send UDP packets to a specified server
    Author:
    Mauro Cicolella

      • UdpHelper

        public UdpHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer(String serverAddress,
                        int serverPort,
                        UdpListener consumer)
        Starts an UDP server listening on the given address and port. It allows to bind a consumer which will be notified of any message received by the UDP server.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - Server UDP address
        serverPort - Server UDP port number
        consumer - UdpListener for incoming packets

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer()
        Stops the UDP server closing the socket.

      • send

        public void send(String serverAddress,
                 int serverPort,
                 String payload)
          throws IOException
        Sends an UDP packet to the server
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - UDP server address
        serverPort - UDP server port number
        payload - data to send
        Throws:
        IOException
